thread.title: Mark

author: Mark
title: Mark
text:
Bought one of the those bikes with the shopping basket on front for the wife on a whim, it was the cheapest i could find so didn't have great expectations.
I emailed customer service the next day as i wanted comfort in their response rates - needn't of worried Kristine from customer service answered my "when will it arrive" query within seconds (wow).
The bike arrived sooner than scheduled and was easy to assemble. It exceeded my expectations regards quality given its budget price, however the stand did break when i leant (probably to heavily) on it.
An email to customer service on the night was answered start of next working day with "we'll pop a replacement in the post"... a replacement stand arrived the next day. (wow)
Only time will tell on the bikes longevity, however can't fault Bikes2udirect... buy with confidence .
Well done and thanks for the great service ! 10 out of 10 from me :)
